duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive the business toward profitable growth
Safeguarding the assets of the branch
Full operational responsibility for all profit and loss-related activities of the branch
Prepare all staff members to deliver exemplary customer service and measure the job performance of the staff
Conduct financial analysis of the business to identify trends and prospective problem areas
Recruit, select, and develop all branch employees
Administer company policies and procedures within the branch
Partner with branch management to coach and counsel employees and address employee performance issues
Manage the sales, operations, and administrative departments of the branch

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Business Management or related field (Master's Preferred)
